headline: Abbott Laboratories (ABT): Short-Term Headwinds, Strategic Pipeline Strength, and UBS Buy Rating
summary: Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) is one of the best 52-week low blue-chip stocks to buy right now. Reuters reported on February 4 that Abbott Laboratories (NYSE:ABT) has logged 860 serious injuries tied to the recall of certain FreeStyle Libre 3 and Libre 3 Plus glucose monitoring sensors, based on the U.S. Food and Drug Administration data […]
